alert.note: Alert for Bolivar (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 8:03PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Bolivar County through 900 PM CDT... At 803 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gunnison, or 8 miles north of Rosedale, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Gunnison around 815 PM CDT. Deeson around 820 PM CDT. Shelby and Winstonville around 835 PM CDT. Mound Bayou and Merigold around 840 PM CDT. Renova around 845 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for northwestern Mississippi.
